llm_res.rule: transferFrom: The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
approve: Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.

Transfer: MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers. A token contract which creates new tokens SHOULD trigger a Transfer event with the _from address set to 0x0 when tokens are created.
